jobs_results.title: iOS Developer in Athens
jobs_results.description:
ARE YOU READY to step up to the New and take your technology expertise to the next level?

Through unmatched industry experience, leading technologies from our ecosystem partners and startups, and the largest delivery network in the world, we provide a powerful range of capabilities that can be tailored to our client‚Äôs most complex business needs. With over 100 innovation hubs deployed around the world, we help clients continuously innovate at speed and at scale so they can outpace their peers. You will bring innovation, intelligence and industry experience together with the newest technologies to help clients innovate at scale and transform their businesses.

Technology is one of four services that make up one Accenture ‚Äìthe others are Strategy and Consulting, Interactive and Operations.

WORK YOU‚ÄôLL DO

As an iOS Developer, you will be responsible for delivering large-scale, complex programs that marry processes with technology to help our clients achieve high performance by leveraging the most current Mobility trends. You will envision, estimate, define, build and deploy Accenture's Mobility solutions using standard delivery assets to improve clients' delivery approach.

Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Documenting business requirements and re-engineering business and/or IT processes
‚Ä¢ Performing application design activities (e.g., designing user interface, usability testing)
‚Ä¢ Assisting in conducting gap analysis between business requirements and software
‚Ä¢ Creating functional requirements as an input to application design and Assisting with build, test, and deploy activities
‚Ä¢ Proposing ideas for using digital and mobile technologies to address client issues and challenges

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
üì¢ Join Novibet as an iOS Developer !

Are you ready to take on a key role in a dynamic, fast-growing company? If you have a passion for iOS technologiesand thrive in a fast-paced environment, this could be the right opportunity for you.

Who We Are

Founded in 2010, Novibet is a leading GameTech company with a strong international presence. We operate in diverse markets, including Greece, Cyprus, Ireland, Canada, Brazil, Mexico, Chile, Ecuador, Finland, Italy, and New Zealand. With offices in Greece, Malta and Brazil, our mission is to deliver unparalleled sports betting and online gaming experiences to our rapidly expanding customer base.

Tech Stack: Our project is written in Swift and we use both UIKit and SwiftUI. We also use the MVVM architecture with modularization, Fastlane and Team City for continuous integration and Firebase for remote config and monitoring.

Why Novibet

At Novibet, we are proud to be certified as a Great Place to Work, consecutively since 2021, reflecting our commitment to developing a positive, inclusive, and supportive work environment. Join us, and you will be part of a team of over 1,000 people worldwide that values collaboration, innovation, and personal growth.

What you will work on
‚Ä¢ Design, build and maintain applications for the iOS platform
‚Ä¢ Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with a team to define app features
‚Ä¢ Identify and fix bugs
‚Ä¢ Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization
‚Ä¢ Contribute to frequent releases by improving our testing and deployment tools

What you bring
‚Ä¢ At least 3 years of experience developing iOS applications
‚Ä¢ University and/or Postgraduate Degree in a relevant field
‚Ä¢ Solid experience in Swift, UIKit and SwiftUI
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services
‚Ä¢ Understanding of Apple's design principles and interface guidelines
‚Ä¢ Understanding of code versioning tools such as Git
‚Ä¢ Constantly learn, improve on your skills, share knowledge and adapt to processes and conventions
‚Ä¢ Creating self-contained, reusable, and testable modules and components
‚Ä¢ Analytical thinking and problem-solving capabilities

Desired Technical Skills
‚Ä¢ Experience working with web sockets
‚Ä¢ Experience with testing (Unit/Integration/UI Automation)
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with continuous integration
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with functional programming principles
‚Ä¢ Experience with protocol oriented programming
‚Ä¢ Familiarity in algorithms and complexity

What we offer

We truly value our people at Novibet! Within our vibrant, dynamic, and fast-paced environment, we encourage everyone to reach their full potential while enjoying every step of the journey. Here‚Äôs how we make that happen:
‚Ä¢ üí∞Competitive Compensation: Attractive salary and bonus scheme
‚Ä¢ üßë‚Äç‚öïÔ∏èHealth insurance: Group health & medical insurance package
‚Ä¢ üíªTop-Notch Equipment: All the tools you need for your role
‚Ä¢ üöÄCareer Growth: Focused career development, performance management, and training opportunities
‚Ä¢ üöóAlternative Transportation: Shuttle buses & Carpooling options
‚Ä¢ üåçInclusive Environment: A welcoming, international, and multicultural team
‚Ä¢ üéâEngaging Activities: Exciting events, sports, and team-building activities

At Novibet we value diversity and are committed to an inclusive and equitable workplace. All decisions regarding recruitment, hiring, promotion, compensation, employee training and development, and all other terms and conditions of employment, are made without regard to race, religious beliefs, color, gender identity, sexual orientation, marital status, disability or chronic disease, age, ancestry or place of origin.

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
Revotech is a technology company dedicated to innovatively combining the latest technologies to catalyse the development of next-generation solutions. Our mission is to enhance human life by radically improving the experience of the services provided within the industries we operate in. We begin by imagining the future, then we build it

‚ÄúBuilding exceptional apps, one line at a time‚Äù

We are seeking a passionate iOS Developer to join our engineering team!

Your Responsibilities Will Include
‚Ä¢ Design, develop, and maintain iOS applications that align with the company‚Äôs vision and user needs
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with designers to transform Figma designs into polished, user-friendly interfaces
‚Ä¢ Proactively suggest improvements to the app‚Äôs architecture and user experience as UI/UX is critical for us
‚Ä¢ Safeguard the projects‚Äô documentation with the utmost caution against any information breach
‚Ä¢ Optimize app performance and troubleshoot issues across a range of iOS devices and OS versions
‚Ä¢ Ensure robust functionality and reliability
‚Ä¢ Stay informed about Apple‚Äôs ecosystem updates, including new APIs, frameworks, and best practices
‚Ä¢ Present progress upon request during a meeting with the business/tech stakeholders
‚Ä¢ Be readily available to discuss features and code details upon request
‚Ä¢ Document processes, workflows, and codebase changes for future reference and team clarity
‚Ä¢ Other tasks as assigned

What You Will Need
‚Ä¢ 3+ years of professional iOS development experience
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in Swift and SwiftUI is a must
‚Ä¢ Experience working with Swift Data or Core Data
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of integrating RESTful APIs and working with JSON
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of design patterns like MVC and MVVM, and best practices for app architecture
‚Ä¢ Experience with performance tuning and optimizing apps for a seamless user experience
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Apple‚Äôs Human Interface Guidelines and App Store submission process
‚Ä¢ Working knowledge of version control systems such as Git
‚Ä¢ A degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field is considered a plus

Revotech Perks
‚Ä¢ Competitive compensation package
‚Ä¢ Company provided equipment
‚Ä¢ An exciting high-growth career trajectory
‚Ä¢ Private health insurance plan
‚Ä¢ Hybrid position for Athens or Thessaloniki
‚Ä¢ Continuous training
‚Ä¢ Part of a youthful talented team striving for innovation

Reports to: Chief Technology Officer

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
At SILVARE, we‚Äôre a small team achieving remarkable results. We‚Äôve built a reputation for delivering fast, impactful results that keep our clients coming back‚Äîmany of whom are some of the biggest names in tech. What makes us different? We‚Äôre easy to talk to, we get straight to the point and we‚Äôre all about making things happen.‚ÄØ

We‚Äôre proud of the strong relationships we build, both with our clients and our team. We believe in keeping our people happy, whether it‚Äôs through improving benefits, having open conversations about their projects or just being there when they need us. It‚Äôs this supportive environment that helps us‚Äîand our people‚Äîthrive.‚ÄØ‚ÄØ

If you‚Äôre ready to work on exciting projects, grow alongside industry leaders and make a real impact, we‚Äôd love to have you join us at SILVARE.‚ÄØ

The Role in a Nutshell‚ÄØ

Do you love creating smooth, intuitive, and visually stunning iOS apps? Are Swift or Objective-C your go-to tools? If you‚Äôre a creative problem-solver who‚Äôs passionate about mobile development, we‚Äôd love to have you onboard as our next iOS Developer!

Your Day-to-Day‚ÄØ

üîπ Developing beautiful, high-performance iOS apps that users can't put down

üîπ Working closely with a team of fun, collaborative designers and developers

üîπ Writing clean, efficient code in Swift or Objective-C

üîπ Optimizing app performance and adding awesome new features

üîπ Troubleshooting, debugging, and ensuring the app is flawless

Your Key Strengths

üîπ 2+ years of iOS development experience

üîπ Proficiency in Swift and/or Objective-C

üîπ Solid understanding of Apple‚Äôs design principles and interface guidelines

üîπ A creative mind with strong problem-solving skills and a team-first attitude

Why You‚Äôll Love Working with Us‚ÄØ

üí∏ Performance Pays Off: Annual bonus based on how you shine throughout the year!‚ÄØ

üçΩÔ∏è Lunch is On Us: Monthly allowance to fuel up with your favorite meals.‚ÄØ

üè• Health First: Private health and life insurance‚Äîbecause your well-being matters.‚ÄØ

üíª Gadgets Galore: Get your own laptop and mobile device, complete with a phone plan to keep you connected.‚ÄØ

üìö Learn Without Limits: Unlimited access to Udemy and all the training you need to grow and thrive.‚ÄØ

üöÄ Career Rocket Fuel: Personalized coaching and mentorship to level up your skills and hit your career goals.‚ÄØ

üéØ Work with the Best: Step up your game by collaborating with industry-leading clients.‚ÄØ

üåà Celebrate Diversity: Join a team that values and thrives on different perspectives.‚ÄØ

Eager to Join Us? Jump in and apply today‚Äîwe‚Äôre excited to see what you can bring to our team!
‚Ä¢ SILVARE Consulting is an Equal Opportunity Employer. SILVARE does not discriminate on the basis of age, race, religion, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, non-disqualifying physical or mental disability, national origin or any other basis covered by appropriate law. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need. #LI-Hybrid

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer (Hybrid or On-site)
Mobile Apps - iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for Mid and/or Senior iOS Developers to join our Product Development Department. You will be part of the Mobile Apps team and together we will build the best native experience in the industry!

The Wow

At Betsson Group, we strive to deliver the best customer experience in the industry. We are one of the market leaders in iGaming, offering online gaming products in several markets, both through our own gaming sites as well as several partner brands.

You will be part of a passionate team, which is building an industry leading, scalable, multi-brand platform to support 25+ online brands! Our brands are used by hundreds of thousands of users and growing.
‚Ä¢ You will be working side by side with some of the greatest talents in the industry.
‚Ä¢ You will be working on applications dealing with high traffic reaching worldwide audiences.
‚Ä¢ You will be able to feel strong ownership of the things we deliver and our success.
‚Ä¢ A friendly and supportive environment; professional development programmes and training that will help you achieve your goals and grow both technically as well as professionally.
‚Ä¢ In addition to all of this, you will be part of the multi-cultural Betsson community.

Great if you have
‚Ä¢ Swift, Xcode and expert in Apple's frameworks and possibilities with native
‚Ä¢ Firebase and all tools included such as analytics, Crashlytics, Firestore, Remote configuration, cloud-messaging, in-app-messaging.
‚Ä¢ Being data driven and excellent knowledge in structuring tracking in app
‚Ä¢ RESTful APIs and using Postman.
‚Ä¢ Github pipeline setup
‚Ä¢ An eye for making high quality iOS views and animations.
‚Ä¢ Scalable and performant applications
‚Ä¢ Design and implement clean, scalable, and high-quality code with unit testing experience.
‚Ä¢ Solving problems and have good software architecture knowledge.
‚Ä¢ Being a Team player.
‚Ä¢ Agile development.
‚Ä¢ Coaching and mentoring other developers.

A taster of what you will be involved with

We want to be pioneers in a highly competitive market, so we continuously strive for technical and product excellence. As part of our team, you will be building new products and features using latest technologies; actively contributing to a state-of-the-art native, which is supporting our core brands.

Our iOS Mobile Apps are built in Swift; and consumes RESTful APIs.

As an iOS Developer, you will be responsible for software development in a very self-leading Agile team with responsibility in everything from DevOps pipeline to production monitoring and support. You will be contributing directly to the success of our products by close collaboration with UX-designers, QA engineers, data analysts and other area teams. You have a strong sense of customer value and will participate in the whole value-chain discussion to contribute the how and what to make our products successful.

What we offer
‚Ä¢ Monthly Allowance for Lunch
‚Ä¢ Private & Life Plan Insurance for you and your family
‚Ä¢ Annual Wellness Allowance
‚Ä¢ Team Building Budget
‚Ä¢ Corporate Travel Insurance
‚Ä¢ Events and initiatives both Local (Quarterly Meetings) and Global
‚Ä¢ Professional Development Programs & Internal Career Opportunities
‚Ä¢ Milestone Birthday

Much like riding a rollercoaster, sometimes life at Betsson can be lightning fast with twists and turns but always FUN! Then again, what else would you expect from a business 75% millennial and 1900 strong, spread across 7 offices! We recognise it may not be for the faint-hearted, but if you're a go-getter, initiator and always striving to push the boundaries and challenge yourself, then you'll fit right in.

We offer numerous challenges where your skills will be put to good use! We encourage innovation, independence and celebrate success where you will be part of multi-cultural and diverse company, with people from all over the world.

Challenge Accepted?

If you are interested to learn more, please apply with your CV in English.

Check out the Betsson Group Blog to find out what our employees are talking about

By submitting your application, you understand that your personal data will be processed as set out in our Privacy Policy.

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer (E-Wallet Product, Fully Remote)
jobs_results.description:
‚Ä¢ Do you have experience as an iOS Developer and would like to contribute to the development of innovative mobile wallet applications?
‚Ä¢ Would you be interested in joining a fully remote team in Greece, contributing to a product that focuses on secure digital identities and mobile driving licenses?

ManpowerGroup Greece, on behalf of its client, an International Technology Services Provider, with focus at offering ISO-compliant Mobile Driving Licenses, Mobile IDs and overall, Wallet Apps, is looking for a Senior iOS Developer to join their Product Team.

üìå Location: Athens Greece

üìç Working Model: Fully Remote (you need to be based in Greece and holder of a valid EU Work Permit)

üñãÔ∏è You will be reporting to: CTO

What you will do:

As a Senior iOS Developer for an innovative E-Wallet product, you will play a crucial role in the design and development of secure mobile wallet applications. Working remotely, you will collaborate with a dedicated team in Greece to enhance features that focus on secure digital identities and mobile driving licenses. Your expertise in iOS development will contribute to creating cutting-edge solutions for ISO-compliant Mobile Driving Licenses, Mobile IDs, and comprehensive Wallet Apps.

Your main responsibilities will be:
‚Ä¢ Designing and building advanced applications for the iOS platform
‚Ä¢ Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
‚Ä¢ Mentoring junior developers, leading by example in terms of code quality and engineering best practices
‚Ä¢ Conducting thorough unit and UI tests to identify malfunctions, ensuring robustness and reliability
‚Ä¢ Staying up-to-date with new technology trends, applications, and protocols within the mobile landscape, especially regarding Android development
‚Ä¢ Evaluating and implementing new technologies to maximize development efficiency

Requirements
‚Ä¢ Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field
‚Ä¢ 6+ years experience as an iOS Developer with a focus on delivering high-quality applications
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in Swift and familiarity with Objective-C
‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of iOS frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation, Core Graphics, and Core Text
‚Ä¢ Experience with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with iOS design principles, patterns, and best practices
‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of mobile app security principles
‚Ä¢ Experience with version control systems, particularly Git
‚Ä¢ Excellent problem-solving skills and a proactive mindset
‚Ä¢ Strong communication and collaboration skills

Benefits
‚Ä¢ An attractive compensation package
‚Ä¢ To be employed as Contractor (preferably for a long-term commitment) - or as an employee
‚Ä¢ Home Office Allowance of ‚Ç¨1,000
‚Ä¢ A MacBook and work screen provided for your convenience
‚Ä¢ A friendly and collaborative working environment
‚Ä¢ Opportunities for professional development and career advancement

Recruitment Process:
‚Ä¢ If you‚Äôre interested in this role, feel free to apply directly. Our consultants will contact the candidates who meet the profile‚Äôs requirements to arrange an interview.
‚Ä¢ As for the next step, there will be 2 more interview round with the Hiring Manager

You can always check all our IT/Technology Roles here: IT Jobs | ManpowerGroup Greece - (manpowergreece.gr)

#Empoweringtalent #WebelieveinTalent #ManpowerGroupGreece

jobs_results.title: IOS DEVELOPER FRESHER/EXPERIENCED
jobs_results.description:
We are looking to hire a talented iOS developer to design, build, and maintain the next generation of iOS applications. Your primary focus will be developing high-end iOS applications for the latest Apple mobile devices. Your duties may include collaborating with the design team for new application features, identifying and fixing application bottlenecks, maintaining the core code, and updating applications published on the App Store.

Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Designing and building mobile applications for Apple‚Äôs iOS platform.
‚Ä¢ Collaborating with the design team to define app features.
‚Ä¢ Ensuring quality and performance of the application to specifications.
‚Ä¢ Identifying potential problems and resolving application bottlenecks.
‚Ä¢ Fixing application bugs before the final release.
‚Ä¢ Publishing application on App Store.
‚Ä¢ Maintaining the code and atomisation of the application.
‚Ä¢ Designing and implementing application updates.

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Bachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science or software engineering.
‚Ä¢ Proven experience as an app developer.
‚Ä¢ Proficient in Objective-C, Swift, and Cocoa Touch.
‚Ä¢ Extensive experience with iOS Frameworks such as Core Data and Core Animation.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of iOS back-end services.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of Apple‚Äôs design principles and application interface guidelines.
‚Ä¢ Proficient in code versioning tools including Mercurial, Git, and SVN.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of C-based libraries.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with push notifications, APIs, and cloud messaging.
‚Ä¢ Experience with continuous integration.

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Engineer
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Greece

At Plum, we're on a mission to maximise wealth for all. We‚Äôre making saving money effortless and turning investing into something everyone can do

Our journey began back in 2017, when we became one of the first to use artificial intelligence and automation to simplify personal finance. Fast forward to today, and we've already helped people save ¬£2 billion across 10 European markets.

Named the UK's fastest-growing fintech in the Deloitte Technology Fast 50, our success is down to the passion and dedication of our diverse team. Based in our London, Athens and Nicosia offices, 180 talented people work together to empower people to do more with their money. And now, the team is growing!

The Role

We‚Äôre looking for a user-focused Senior iOS Engineer to join our engineering team. Plum has been featured multiple times by Apple, has been named App of the Day and currently rated 4.7 stars with over 59,000 ratings. You'll be building Plum on iOS from its early days, giving our current and prospective customers a more intimate way to interact with their money.

Our Engineering Approach

We value good engineering principles, imagination, quirkiness and healthy curiosity. We take a conservative approach to using external frameworks and we aspire to write simple, well-tested code, delivered in rapid iterations.

How We Work

We work in "squads" ‚Äì a more startup-appropriate name for saying small, cross-functional teams. Each squad has a mission and a set of KPIs to monitor and improve. As an engineer you'll be working in a squad, but you can also reach out to and work with anyone in the company. You will also be a part of a Mobile engineering team, consisting of Mobile Product Engineers who share the same vision and passion of building an exceptional mobile team that will help people be financially better off.

What we look for

Technical knowledge is critical but we are a startup treading in uncharted territory so attitude is even more important. We're looking for people that like uncertainty and want to figure out how to do things that haven‚Äôt been done before. You're a true team player and inherently positive. Where others see problems, you see solutions.
‚Ä¢ You have a strong understanding of the iOS SDK and its frameworks
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôre well versed in Swift and stay up-to-date with the latest changes
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôre proficient in writing robust, testable code with a comprehensive understanding of the testing pyramid
‚Ä¢ You have extensive experience in shipping and iterating upon apps in the App Store
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôre not afraid to take ownership and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers and other engineers.
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôve mentored junior engineers helping them enhance their skills and grow professionally
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôre a product person too ‚Äî you understand the value and impact of your work
‚Ä¢ You go the extra mile to add the awesome sprinkles

Fist-bumps if you have üëä
‚Ä¢ Experience in continuous integration setup and automation
‚Ä¢ Taken part in open-source projects
‚Ä¢ Experience with backend technologies
‚Ä¢ Experience with The Composable Architecture and SwiftUI
‚Ä¢ Experience with Combine and async/await
‚Ä¢ Experience with E2E testing

What to Expect from Our Hiring Process

At Plum, we value a lot the time you devote to the hiring process, this is why we are always trying to make the process as fast and smooth as possible.
‚Ä¢ 30 min. Call with our Talent Acquisition Team. So we understand better your career plan, tell you more about Plum and the role. ‚öôÔ∏è
‚Ä¢ 45 min. Call with our Engineering Lead. Brief technical discussion about the role and your skills. üèÑ
‚Ä¢ Task. You will be given a task for us to better to understand your skills. No hard deadlines! üïπÔ∏è
‚Ä¢ Team Interviews
a. Call with two people from our iOS team. We'll go over the task and introduce you to your future colleagues and to get a glimpse of Plum's culture. üß¨
b.Call with a Product and Engineering Manager for you to understand the business and envision yourself as part of Plum.
‚Ä¢ Offer üí∏

Plum's Perks
‚Ä¢ We're all in this together! Own part of the company through stock options üí∑
‚Ä¢ Annual training budget
‚Ä¢ Private Health & Life Insurance
‚Ä¢ Free Plum Premium subscription (normally ¬£9.99 a month).
‚Ä¢ Free parking slots
‚Ä¢ Flexible approach to remote working, though we encourage at least 2-3 days a week in our beautiful office in Athens for optimal collaboration
‚Ä¢ 25 days holiday a year, excluding public holidays (34 in total)
‚Ä¢ Employee referral scheme up to ‚Ç¨4000
‚Ä¢ 45 days work from anywhere
‚Ä¢ Team breakfast on Tuesdays and team lunch on Thursdays in the office, as well as a plentiful supply of fruit, snacks and coffee
‚Ä¢ 1 day paid leave for volunteering, supporting you giving back to society
‚Ä¢ 2 weeks paid sabbatical after four years of service
‚Ä¢ Team trip to secret destinations once a year ‚úàÔ∏è
‚Ä¢ Great office location in the heart of Athens (Syntagma square), with an amazing view!
‚Ä¢ A vibe that‚Äôs ü¶ÑüåàüíØ

If you think this sounds like a bit of you then don‚Äôt hesitate to get in touch!

Thanks,
Plum Œ§eam üíú
‚Ä¢ Plum is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Plum does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, non-disqualifying physical or mental disability, national origin or any other basis covered by appropriate law. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.

jobs_results.title: IOS Developer - Hybrid Athens
jobs_results.description:
IOS Developer- Hybrid Athens

We challenge and innovate to connect people, businesses, and

communities across the world. Delighting our customers and earning their

loyalty drive us, and we experiment, learn fast and get it done, together.

With us, you can truly be yourself and belong, share inspiration, embrace

new opportunities, thrive, and make a real difference.

We are seeking a talented IOS developer to join our growing team.

Education, Training, and Experience
‚Ä¢ University or College Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or relevant technology-related field
‚Ä¢ At least three (3) years of working experience in a similar position
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in Swift, SwiftUI and iOS SDK
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with the development of different form factors (tablets, phones), iOS versions
‚Ä¢ Understanding of Apple‚Äôs design principles and interface guidelines, as well as of AppStore publish process
‚Ä¢ Good experience in Design Patterns like MVC, MVVM, etc.
‚Ä¢ Experience with iOS frameworks such as Core Location, Core Animation, Realm etc.
‚Ä¢ Memory Management understanding
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services
‚Ä¢ Proven ability to ship apps throughout their lifecycle.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity in using version control software such as Git
‚Ä¢ A plus will be to have knowledge of the gambling industry (any of the Lottery, Casino, Sportsbook)
‚Ä¢ Excellent command of the Greek & English language, both written and spoken
‚Ä¢ Completed military obligations for male candidates

Duties and Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ In charge of various technical issues, like coding of modules using provided specifications, debugging and fixing defects that may come up
‚Ä¢ Responsible to ensure that our applications are properly integrated with various APIs and interfacing with a variety of related systems
‚Ä¢ Handle data and web service, including JSON, REST and Sockets

What's in it for you:
‚Ä¢ Competitive pay, remuneration package
‚Ä¢ Hybrid role
‚Ä¢ Access to learning resources and trainings.
‚Ä¢ Special employee offers and discounts.
